thread.title: Rampage win again in Grand Rapids
thread.title_full: Rampage win again in Grand Rapids - San Antonio Express-News

author: mysanantonio.com
title: Rampage win again in Grand Rapids
text:
Rampage 4, Grand Rapids 0
GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. â€” Rampage goaltender Calvin Pickard made 35 saves in shutting out the Griffins and completing a back-to-back sweep Saturday in front of 3,863 at Van Andel Arena.
Dennis Everberg scored twice and Andrew Agozzino recorded a goal and two assists for the Rampage (2-0-1-0), who beat Grand Rapids 3-2 on Friday. The Griffins remain winless in four tries this season.
Everberg buried the rebound off a Zach Redmond shot in the sixth minute of play. The Rampage have scored first in each of their first three games.
Redmond struck less than a minute later, and Agozzino scored off a rebound in the next minute to prompt Grand Rapids to pull goalie Tom McCollum in favor of Jared Coreau . Everberg finished the scoring with an empty net goal in the third period.
The Rampage were 2 for 4 on the power play and are now a robust 5 for 14 this season (35.7 percent).
Next: Stockton @Rampage, 7 p.m. Saturday
Radio: KTKR-AM 760
Staff report
